scripts.text:
WITH datefield AS (
SELECT GETDATE()-1 AS PD,
    FORMAT((GETDATE()-1), 'yyyyMMdd', 'en-us') AS PD_ID
    )

INSERT INTO [dbo].[cfgSubmissionInfo] ( 
        [FileHandle]
        ,[PostDate]
        ,[PostDate_ID]
        ,[FormatFileName]
        ,[FormatFilePath]
        ,[TableName]
        ,[RawFileName]
        ,[FilePath]
        ,[AmountColumn]
        ,[FirstRows]
    )
SELECT 
    1 AS FileHandle,
    PD AS PostDate,
    PD_ID AS PostDate_ID,
    'formatF_7.txt' AS FormatFileName,
    'C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\TASk_7' AS FormatFilePath,
    '_rawATB' AS TableName,
    CONCAT('Account_',MONTH(PD),'.',DAY(PD),'.',YEAR(PD),'.txt') AS RawFileName,
    'C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\TASk_7' AS rawFilePath,
    'CurrentBalance' AS AmountColumn,
    2 AS FirstRows
FROM datefield
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    2 AS FileHandle,
    PD AS PostDate,
    PD_ID AS PostDate_ID  ,
    'formatF_7_txn_chr.txt' AS  FormatFileName,
    'C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\TASk_7' AS FormatFilePath,
    '_rawTXNS_CHGS' AS TableName,
    CONCAT('Transaction-Charge__',MONTH(PD),'.',DAY(PD),'.',YEAR(PD),'.txt') AS RawFileName,
    'C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\TASk_7' AS rawFilePath,
    'TxnAmount' AS AmountColumn,
    2 AS FirstRows
FROM datefield;

activities.name: Send mail about Successed 1
activities.description: Send mail about Successed Insert to cfgSubmissionInfo and started ETL Process.

body.message: ETL Process was started. This is a custom dynamic message from your pipeline with run ID @{pipeline().RunId}.

activities.name: Send mail about Fail 1
activities.description: Send mail about Fail Insert to cfgSubmissionInfo

body.message: This object was added earlier. ETL process didn't start. This is a custom dynamic message from your pipeline with run ID @{pipeline().RunId}.

activities.name: Send mail about Fail 2
activities.description: Send mail about "Fail" Bulk insert procedure for Atb data

body.message: Bulk insert procedure for Atb data was FAILED. This is a custom dynamic message from your pipeline with run ID @{pipeline().RunId}.

activities.name: Send mail about Fail 3
activities.description: Send mail about "Fail" Bulk insert procedure for TxnChar data

body.message: Bulk insert procedure for TxnChar data was FAILED.  This is a custom dynamic message from your pipeline with run ID @{pipeline().RunId}.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
CREATE TABLE #Check_atb_files (column_1 VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL)

DECLARE @filename VARCHAR(50)

SELECT @filename=CONCAT('Account_', MONTH(GETDATE()-1),'.',DAY(GETDATE()-1),'.',YEAR(GETDATE()-1),'.txt')

EXEC('BULK Insert #Check_atb_files From ''C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\Task_7\'+@filename+'''
        With (FIRSTROW =2,  rowterminator = ''\n'');');
SELECT*
FROM #Check_atb_files

CREATE TABLE #Check_txn_char_files (column_1 VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL)

DECLARE @filenametxn VARCHAR(50)

SELECT @filenametxn=CONCAT('Transaction-Charge__', MONTH(GETDATE()-1),'.', DAY(GETDATE()-1),'.',YEAR(Getdate()-1),'.txt')

EXEC('BULK Insert #Check_txn_char_files From ''C:\Users\Alina_Parkhomenko\Desktop\study\BI__\Task_7\'+@filenametxn+'''
        With (FIRSTROW =2,  rowterminator = ''\n'');');
		
SELECT *
FROM #Check_txn_char_files

SELECT 'newttestserver-firstdbtest-key' AS 'secretkey','dbo' AS schema_tabName, 'test3' AS tablename
UNION ALL
SELECT 'newtwotestswerver-seconddbtest-key' AS 'secretkey','dbo' AS schema_tabName , 'test3' AS tablename
